name: Xianxia Simulator
description:
Xianxia Simulator is a text-based xianxia RPG where you play as a lone cultivator, trying your best to survive in the cruel cultivation world. Your goal here, like most cultivator is to ascend to immortality. Although you might have other goals, but mostly, that’s how you win the game.

Fair warning, although at the moment the content in the game is basically nothing, there will be a lot of violence, some gore, a lot of arrogant young masters and petty ancestors who could kill your character with just a sneeze in the future.

The game is in development and constantly changing. Almost everything here is a place holder for something else. So be prepare for tons of typos, bugs and imperfection.
